ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local mana_total = EffectController():GetTotalMana() local mana_paid = GetEffectX() if mana_paid == mana_total - 2 then EffectDC():Int_Dec(COMPARTMENT_ID_X) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local power = GetEffectX() local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( power ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 0 ) end
